Part Name: A/C Treatment Cartridges with UV Dye Part # 203200
Descriptions:
[

Features and Benefits

1oz/30ml cartridge for use with the Professional A/C Treatment Kit

  • Contains a high-performance lubricant which reduces friction, quiets noisy compressors and extends compressor life
  • Rejuvenates o-rings, gaskets and other rubber components
  • Contains concentrated universal A/C dye for easy leak detection
  • OEM approved and SAE J-2297 Certified Dye

 

Product Description

TerraClean A/C Treatment Cartridges with UV Dye improves A/C performance and protects the system in older vehicles.  For use by A/C specialists as part of a preventative maintenance package with existing services.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Contains a lubricity enhancer to increase the performance of an A/C System and the life of its components
  • Uses 2 oz of R134a to replenish the system with refrigerant
  • Adds a high quality dye to help detect hard to find cooling system leaks
  • Conditions seals and O-rings to prevent minor leakage
  • Compatible with all R134a A/C Systems, including hybrid vehicles
  • Certified to meet the SAE J2297 and SAE J2670 Standards

Product Description

TerraClean A/C Tune Up replenishes the A/C System with R134a without the need to completely recover and recharge the system. Simply install on the low pressure side using a charging hose (Part Number 98037169). It adds a lubricity enhancer that improves the oil in the A/C system to reduce wear on the compressor. In fact, it more than doubles the extreme pressure properties of OEM PAG oil. A/C Tune Up revitalizes seals, preventing minor leakage in the A/C system. It also contains a premium dye to help detect hard to find leaks.

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • A preventative A/C treatment that improves performance and protects system components in aging vehicles
  • Kit includes injection gun, PICO-Lite ™ 1 watt Luxeon® LED, 6 TerraClean A/C treatment cartridges, R-12 and R-134a adapters and UV enhancing glasses.

Product Description

Each 1 oz Treatment cartridge contains a high performance lubricant which reduces friction, quiets noisy compressors and extends compressor life.   It also rejuvenates o-rings and gaskets and contains A/C dye for easy leak detection.

 

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Certified to meet SAE J2670 standard
  • Safely seals hard to find leaks
  • Specifically formulated to seal a leak rate of 25 oz. /708 g per year
  • Fully compatible with R-134a, R-12, and R1234yf.
  • TerraGuard will not harm recovery equipment
  • Oil based formula – will not harden, crystallize or clog the A/C system
  • Contains UV Dye certified to meet SAE J-2297 standard
  • Contains 2 TerraGuard cartridges, primer cartridge to pre-fill the hose, bleed adapter, injection gun and adapter hose

Product Description

TerraGuard Professional A/C Sealant safely seals leaks in both rubber and metal components. It is compatible with all refrigerants and will not harm recovery machines.TerraGuard will not react to moisture and will not harden, crystallize or clog A/C systems.

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • The latest A/C supplement from TerraClean combines our best technologies
  • Quickly and effectively stops leaks with TerraGuard™ technology
  • Detects leaks with premium UV dye
  • Additive package enhances A/C system performance and prolongs life
  • Tops off A/C systems with an extra 2 oz. of R-134a refrigerant
  • Will not harm A/C system or recovery equipment
  • Includes 2 x hose adapters per box of 12. No additional injection equipment required

 

Product Description

This is the one supplement you need to stop leaks, enhance performance, extend component life, and top up refrigerant.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

1oz/30ml cartridge for use with the TerraGuard Injection Kit

  • Certified to meet SAE J2670 standard
  • Fully compatible with R-134a, R-12, and R1234yf*.
  • Stays in the A/C system and stop leaks when they occur
  • Safe for all vehicle A/C systems and recovery machines
  • Leak rate tested
  • Wear tested

 

Product Description

All automotive air conditioning systems leak – even new ones. In fact the California Air Resource Board estimates that automobiles leak on average 85 grams per year. Terraguard is specially formulated to seal a leak rate of 709 grams per year. It reacts to oxygen and pressure – so there is no chance of harming recovery systems and will not harden, crystallize or clog the A/C system.

*Hose adapter assembly 471547 needs to be purchased in order to be compatible with R1234yf.

 

 

>> SDS File

]

Part Name: Battery Terminal Cleaner and Leak Detector Kit Part # 208200
Descriptions:
[

 

Features and Benefits

  • Cleans battery terminals and connections
  • Helps find acid leaks
  • Neutralizes battery acid
  • Impedes corrosion on battery terminals

 

Product Description

This easy to use kit consists of a cleaner and acid leak detector along with a set of battery pads. Simply apply the cleaner to the battery terminals and brush off any debris and rinse with water. This product also contains a pink pH sensitive dye that will turn a clear yellow color when exposed to acids to help detect acid leaks from cracks in the battery case.

After cleaning and drying the battery terminals, the battery pads are installed on each terminal. These pads wil fit both top and side style terminal posts. The pads contain a chemical inhibitor to protect against future corrosion.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

  • Meets or exceeds FMVSS-116 and SAE J1703

Product Description

BrakeVac II 500-8100

The BrakeVac II brake bleeder machine is a simple, user friendly and efficient way to flush and bleed today’s high tech brake systems. The BrakeVac II reduces the concerns associated with both air pressure and vacuum style brake bleeding.

Vacuum pump to easily remove fluid from brake fluid reservoir

Complete brake system flush in just 10 minutes

Protects against metal corrosion.

  • Suitable for use in all applications requiring DOT 4 or DOT 3
  • Protects against metal corrosion
  • Meets or exceeds FMVSS-116, SAE J1703and SAE J1704
  • High and low viscosity control
  • Superior lubrication properties prevent seal hardening or softening

Product Description

TerraClean® High Performance Brake Fluid is engineered for all disc and drum-type brake systems, which require DOT 4 or DOT 3 Brake Fluid. Its superior temperature formulation greatly reduces the tendency to vaporize at elevated temperatures, which are common in today’s braking systems.

High Performance Brake Fluid is available in 32oz (part number 205220) and 64oz (part number 205204) bottles.

 

]

[

CoolantClean III 500-5100P

The CoolantClean III exchanges virtually all of the used coolant mixture in vehicle’s cooling system in a few simple steps. The CoolantClean III coolant flush service can increase a shop’s profits by reducing the time it takes to do a complete fluid exchange to approximately 15 minutes. Simply by connecting to the vehicle’s upper radiator hose, the unit will flush virtually all of the old coolant and replace it with the new coolant.

 

Features and Benefits

System now allows for both static and dynamic cooperation

New on-board waste tank has a 28 quart capacity

Unique vacuum switch allows for cooling system depressurization

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Combines Cooling System Flush and Cooling System Treatment
  • Removes rust, scale and other residues in vehicle cooling systems
  • Helps inhibit the formation of new deposits that can cause overheating of the cooling system
  • Lubricates water pumps Works with both conventional and long life fluid

Product Description

TerraClean® Cooling System Flush Kits help you perform a complete cooling system service. TerraClean Cooling System Flush eliminates contaminants such as rust and scale from the entire cooling system. After performing a cooling system flush, adding TerraClean® Cooling System Treatment slows the formation of rust and scale in new coolant while lubricating the water pump. TerraClean® Cooling System Flush and Cooling System Treatment will not damage cooling systems and works with both conventional and long life coolants.

 

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Removes rust and scale and other residues from the cooling system
  • Helps prevent cooling system overheating
  • Extends the life of the cooling system

 

Product Description

Rust and scale can accumulate in the cooling system of a vehicle.  These deposits can impede the flow of the coolant through the system.  As well, scale can act as an insulator, which reduces the ability of the cooling system to transfer heat.  TerraClean Cooling System Flush eliminates rust and scale from the entire cooling system.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Stops leaks in radiator heater cores, seals and expansion plugs
  • Protects against head gasket damage
  • Works with conventional and long life fluid

 

Product Description

Pin hole size leaks can quickly lead to cooling system failure. When used as part of a cooling system fluid exchange, TerraClean Cooling System Sealant prevents these leaks in radiator cores and cooling system seals. Cooling System Sealant can also be added to the coolant to stop small leaks once they have been detected.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

 

Features and Benefits

  • Prevents rust and corrosion in the cooling system
  • Inhibits formation of deposits that can cause overheating
  • Lubricates the water pump
  • Works with conventional and long life fluid

 

Product Description

Scale and rust can impede the flow of coolant within a vehicle’s cooling system. TerraClean Cooling System Treatment slows the formation of rust and scale in new coolant while lubricating the water pump.

 

>> SDS File

]

Features and Benefits

  • Thoroughly cleans the EGR Circuit removing stubborn carbon deposits, eliminating the need for teardown and part replacement
  • Eliminates issues caused by biodiesel and water in fuel
  • An easy to perform procedures with noticeable results
  • A wide variety of adapters available to suit the needs of today’s Diesel Specialist

 

 

Product Description

EGR systems can become clogged with carbon deposits that affect fuel economy and performance of a diesel vehicle.

The TerraDiesel EGR Cleaning Tool applies a powerful cleaner, TerraDiesel EGR and Induction System Cleaner, into the circuit.  For most applications the exhaust side is serviced, then the intake side.  This cleaner rapidly dissolves the deposits, eliminating the issues commonly associated with plugged EGRs.

 

Go to App Guide
]

Part Name: TerraDiesel EGR System Cleaner (1 U.S. Gallon) Part # 201279
Descriptions:
[

Features and Benefits

Removes Carbon Deposits from EGR and Induction Systems Reduces Regeneration Cycles Lowers Emissions and Smooths rough idle Improves Performance and Fuel Economy

Product Description

The EGR system of a diesel engine often accumulates carbon deposits.  These deposits can negatively affect the performance of an engine.  TerraDiesel EGR and Induction System Cleaner removes these deposits, restoring the fuel economy and performance of an engine. It is applied to the EGR using a TerraDiesel EGR Cleaning Tool and adapter as part of an Diesel EGR Service

• Concentrated fuel detergent is specially formulated to clean high pressure common rail, pump and injectors

• Restores performance and fuel economy

• Removes excess carbon, varnish and improves emissions.

• For use with TerraDiesel™ 500-4006T Machine (Mix 1 part detergent with 1 part diesel fuel)

 

>> SDS File

]

[

 

Features and Benefits

  • TerraDiesel Fuel Injector Cleaner is designed to be a rapid cleanup product for diesel and biodiesel fueled engines
  • Removes gums, varnishes and carbon deposits from fuel system components
  • Exceeds the requirements of the Cummins L-10 Superior Injector Deposit Control Test

 

Product Description

TerraDiesel Fuel Injector Cleaner significantly lowers emissions and improves performance in as little as two hours of normal operation.  Simply add to diesel fuel to treat and add once a month to continue to operate at peak performance. Available in 12oz Bottles (p/n 201255) and 32oz Bottles (p/n 201256)

 

>> SDS File

]

[

 

Features and Benefits

  • Disperses its own volume in water
  • Works great in storage tanks
  • Acts as an effective stability agent by reducing oxidation and preventing breakdown through reactions with water

Product Description

TerraDiesel Fuel Treatment is an effective method of maintaining diesel performance.  Not only does it eliminate water without the use of alcohols, it also improves combustion for better fuel economy, lower emissions and increased power.  One 8oz bottle treats 250 Gallons.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • The ultimate all-season Multi-Function Treatment for High, Low, Ultra Low Sulfur and Biodiesel Blends
  • Disperses water without the use of harmful alcohols
  • Raises cetane, inhibits corrosion and eliminates the growth of bacteria in diesel fuels
  • Prevents fuel gelling in cold weather climates

Product Description

TerraDiesel Multi-Function Fuel Treatment will improve the performance of diesel engines.  By dispersing water from diesel fuel, it eliminates bacteria and prevents corrosion.  Because it improves atomization, TerraDiesel Multi-Function Fuel Treatment improves fuel economy and lower emissions.  It removes existing gum, varnish and carbon deposits in the fuel system and helps keep particulate traps clean.  Available in 12oz Bottles (p/n 201250) and 32oz Bottles (p/n 201251)

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Combines TerraDiesel Multi-function Fuel Treatment and TerraDiesel Fuel Injector Cleaner
  • Performs a rapid clean up of diesel and biodiesel-fueled engines
  • Removes gums, varnishes and carbon deposits from fuel system components
  • Disperses water without the use of harmful alcohols
  • Raises cetane, inhibits corrosion and eliminates the growth of bacteria in diesel fuels
  • Prevents fuel gelling in cold weather climates

Product Description

The Minor Diesel Fuel kit is the basis of any Diesel Service.  Both products are simply added to the fuel tank of a diesel engine, so no special equipment is required. First, TerraDiesel Fuel Injector Cleaner is added to the fuel to remove gums, varnishes and carbon deposits.  This will significantly lower emissions and improve performance in as little as two hours of normal operation.  TerraDiesel Multi-Function Fuel Treatment is then added to the fuel tank. By dispersing water from diesel fuel, Multi-Function Fuel Treatment eliminates bacteria and prevents corrosion.  Because it improves atomization, Multi-Function Fuel Treatment improves fuel economy and lower emissions.  It removes existing gum, varnish and carbon deposits in the fuel system and helps keep particulate traps clean.

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Combines 2 64oz jugs of 75W-140 Synthetic Gear Oil for four wheel drive applications
  • Recommended for applications requiring GL-5 Gear Oils
  • Provides superior anti-wear and extreme pressure protection
  • Suitable for limited slip applications without the need of an additional additive

Product Description

The 75W-140 Differential Kit is perfect for service providers that work on 4 wheel drive vehicles. Combining 2 jugs of TerraClean Synthetic Gear Oil, both differentials receive the protection they need in extreme conditions. TerraClean Synthetic Gear Oil is made using a PAO base stock and a superior additive package. It works well in extreme weather conditions and provides the consumer with excellent anti-wear protection and oxidation stability. TerraClean Synthetic Gear Oil is formulated to work in limited slip applications so no extra additives are required when working on this type of differential.

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Multi-purpose performance additive for differentials, transfer cases and manual transmission
  • Improves heat transfer for cooler operation
  • Prevents oil breakdown
  • Protects system components from water and moisture build up
  • Meets GL-5 standard for differentials, transfer cases, and manual transmission.
  • Improves heat transfer for cooler operation
  • Extends life of components

 

Product Description

Gear oils can deteriorate as they are exposed to heat and oxidization.  This deterioration can lead to expensive damage to differentials, manual transmissions and transfer cases.  Terraclean Gear Oil Treatment guards against the break-down of gear oil.  It contains extreme pressure and anti-wear agents that ensure the components are protected against premature wear, which extends the life of your customer’s vehicles.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • For use in vehicles equipped with limited slip (positraction) or locking differentials
  • Eliminates limited slip differential chatter
  • Improves lubricant stability and heat transfer
  • Meets ZF application specifications

 

Product Description

TerraClean Limited Slip Treatment improves the heat transfer and thermal stability of gear oil, which improves component life.  It  eliminates the chatter that is associated with limited slip applications and improves performance in heavy duty applications.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Recommended for applications requiring GL-5 gear oils
  • Superior anti-wear and extreme pressure protection
  • Suitable for limited slip performance without an additional additive

Product Description

TerraClean® Gear Oils are formulated to provide superior performance in Differentials and Manual Transmissions requiring GL5 Oils. They are made using a PAO Synthetic base stock oil with a superior additive package. This provides excellent anti-wear protection, ensures oxidation stability and delivers extreme-pressure performance. It has a high viscosity index and a low pour point, so it works well in both extremely high and low temperature applications.

TerraClean® Gear Oils are formulated for Limited Slip applications, so there is no need to add any additives for this type of differential.

Available in 32oz (Part Number 204240) and 64oz (Part Number 204244) bottles.

 

>> SDS File

]

Descriptions:
[

Features and Benefits

  • Fully Synthetic formula For Manual Transmissions and Transfer Cases Requiring ATF or GL-1 – GL-4 Gear Oils

>> TerraClean Functional Fluid Guide
>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Combines TerraClean Engine Treatment and TerraClean Engine Oil Cleaner
  • Reduces friction and engine wear while preventing zinc and phosphorus damage to catalytic converters
  • Reduces or eliminates white sludge caused by ethanol blended fuels
  • Formulated to work with all motor oils including API GF-5

Product Description

The 2 Part Engine Clean is ideal package for premium oil changes. Before changing the oil, TerraClean Engine Oil Cleaner is added to the old oil. It infuses the engine oil with a detergent that cleans the entire oil system without damaging it. This cleaner is circulated throughout the system by running the engine for 10 minutes. The cleaner removes and holds these contaminants in suspension. When the oil is drained, all the dirt, sludge and combustion by-products safely flow out with the old oil and cleaner.

TerraClean Engine Treatment is then added to the new oil. This is an effective treatment for today’s engines. It contains a highly modified form of ZDP (Zinc Dithiophosphate) that will not separate in the presence of ethanol. This provides all the protective and friction reduction / anti-wear characteristics engines need but without causing damage to expensive components such as catalytic converters.

TerraClean Engine Treatment will work with all motor oils including the latest API GF-5 standard.

 

]

Part Name: 2 Part Oil and Fuel Kit Part # 206201
Descriptions:
[

 

Features and Benefits

  • Combines TerraClean Engine Treatment with Optima Fuel System Cleaner
  • Performs a rapid clean up of the entire fuel system
  • Removes gum, varnish and carbon deposits while inhibiting reformation
  • Reduces friction and engine wear while increasing power and fuel economy
  • Protects the engine without the potential damage to the catalytic converter that can come from Zinc and Phosphorus
  • Eliminates the formation of white sludge caused by ethanol blended fuels
  • Formulated to work with all motor oils including API GF-5 Ideal for high mileage engines

Product Description

Optima Fuel System Cleaner, when added to gasoline rapidly, cleans clogged injectors and restores proper spray patterns.  It will remove water from the fuel system and helps prevent rust and corrosion.

Most gasoline products contain ethanol.  Ethanol can enter the crankcase as a blow-by gas.  When this happens, the ethanol can mix with water from condensation and form a white sludge.  TerraClean Engine treatment prevents the formation of this sludge and protects the engine from friction and wear.

]

[

2 Part Oil Change Kit

A great item for premium oil change

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Cleans internal engine components
  • Liquifies sludge and combustion by products
  • Improves engine performance and lowers harmful emissions
  • Safe for use with gasoline and diesel engines

Product Description

As engine oil deteriorates, sludge and other contaminants can accumulate within the oil system.  These contaminants can accumulate and damage engine components.  During a conventional oil change some of these contaminants remain trapped and the new oil becomes contaminated. Adding TerraClean Engine Oil Cleaner to oil prior to the change liquifies and removes this sludge keeping the oil cleaner, longer.

 

>> SDS File

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Reduces friction and engine wear while increasing power and fuel economy
  • It protects the engine from wear without the potential damage to the catalytic converter that can come from Zinc and Phosphorus
  • It eliminates the formation of white sludge caused by ethanol blended fuels
  • Formulated to work with all motor oils including API GF-5

 

Product Description

Ethanol blended fuels continue to become more common.  Ethanol can enter the crankcase as a blow by gas.  When this happens, the ethanol can mix with water from condensation and form a white sludge.  TerraClean Engine treatment protects the engine from friction and engine wear and protects against the formation of this sludge.

Some engine treatments contain zinc and phosphorous to help reduce friction.  Unfortunately, this zinc and phosphorus can drop out of the oil and destroy the catalytic converter.  TerraClean Engine Treatment is designed specifically to retain the zinc and phosphorus so both the engine and the catalytic converter are protected.

 

>> SDS File

]

Product Description

The 3 part Major Fuel Kit is designed for service providers that want to perform a complete Air/Fuel system clean up. First, Fuel System Purge is fed through the fuel rail using a pressurized canister fuel tool. It uses proprietary chemistry to clean combustion chamber deposits, revitalize performance and restore fuel economy. It also inhibits fuel system corrosion and eliminates hesitation. It contains a concentrated detergent package that rapidly cleans the fuel system including injectors and intake valves.

Carbon deposits can form on the back side of intake valves. This is particularly true on newer Direct Injection Engines. Intake Valve Deposit Cleaner effectively cleans intake valves as well as the combustion chamber, piston crowns, piston ring lands and fuel injector tips. It is applied using the TerraClean Pressurized Induction Tool through the air induction system or through a vacuum line.

TerraClean Optima Fuel System Cleaner is added directly to fuel to complete the air/fuel service. Optima cleans clogged injectors and restores proper spray patterns. It will remove water from the fuel system and help prevent rust and corrosion.

Why use theTerraClean Decarbonizer?

The TerraClean Fuel System Decarbonizer’s revolutionary technology goes beyond that of “traditional decarbonizers” by removing carbon deposits from the entire fuel system, including catalytic converters and O2 Sensors.  Where other systems use harsh additives, TerraClean decarbonizes the entire fuel system using technologically advanced chemistry that is safe for the technicians, the vehicle components and the environment.  As well, unlike solvent or detergent based cleaners which can increase emissions during and after service, virtually no noxious emissions are emitted during a TerraClean service. Product Description

This is a perfect kit for service providers that want to offer a decarbonizing service while eliminating the harmful effects of ethanol. The Minor Decarb Kits eliminates carbon and varnish deposits throughout the fuel system. It also cleans the combustion chamber, the O2 sensor and the catalytic converter. Applied through the fuel rail using a TerraClean Decarbonizer, TerraClean Fuel Injector Cleaner first cleans the intake valves, injectors and combustion chambers of a vehicle. Then TerraClean Fuel and Post Combustion Cleaner cleans and decarbonizes the fuel system, combustion chambers, O2 sensors and catalytic converters. Concentrated Fuel Treatment is then added to the fuel tank. This chemically changes water that may be present in the gas tank, creating a combustible hydrocarbon. As well, it increases fuel atomization to improve fuel economy and performance.

Product Description

The Optima / IV Cleaner Kit is designed for service providers that want to perform a complete Air/Fuel system service without the need to connect to the fuel rail. Carbon deposits can form on the back side of intake valves. This is particularly true on newer Direct Injection Engines. Intake Valve Deposit Cleaner effectively cleans intake valves as well as the combustion chamber, piston crowns, piston ring lands and fuel injector tips. It is applied using the TerraClean Pressurized Induction Tool through the air induction system or through a vacuum line. TerraClean Optima Fuel System Cleaner cleans clogged injectors and restores proper spray patterns. It will remove water from the fuel system and helps prevent rust and corrosion. Optima is added to gas as part of a complete air/fuel service.

]

[

Features and Benefits

  • Can be used to clean induction system through the air intake or through a vacuum line
  • Tool comes complete with S-tool and vacuum line attachment
  • Easy to read gauge for accurate pressure settings
  • Sight glass allows the Technician to monitor chemical level – no guessing when the service is complete
  • Schrader valve on gauge assembly allows for simple, safe depressurization of the system when the service is complete

Product Description

Direct Injection Engines are particularly susceptible to carbon build up on the backs of the intake valves. These valves are not cleaned during a conventional fuel system service and require a separate cleaning through the induction system. As more and more vehicles are made with Direct Injection Engines, there is a greater need to service the Intake Valves separately from a conventional Fuel System Cleaning.

The TerraClean Pressurized Induction Tool helps you perform an effective induction service on Direct or Conventional Fuel Injected Engines. After filling the tool’s cylinder with TerraClean Intake Valve and Deposit Cleaner 201230, it is pressurized using shop air. The S-Tool is placed inside the intake past the Mass Air Flow Sensor and a fine spray of cleaner is introduced into the system. The intake valve deposit cleaner is sprayed on to the valves, ensuring that they are cleaned of hard carbon deposits that negatively impact effective combustion. Alternatively, using the Vacuum line attachment, the tool can be connected through a vacuum line, allowing for a faster introduction of the chemical into the air intake.

MiST is highly effective in treating vehicle HVAC systems as well as cabin surfaces, restoring the in-car air quality of your customer’s vehicle. For use with the MiST II Ultrasonic Cleaning Unit.

Features and Benefits

  • Combines Power Steering Fluid and Conditioner with Power Steering Cleaner
  • Thoroughly cleans the power steering system
  • Contains a unique friction modifier to reduce power steering noise
  • Conditions seals to eliminate and help prevent leaks
  • Safe for use on all conventional and ATF based power steering systems

Product Description

Power steering fluid is subjected to extreme heat and pressure, which can cause the fluid to degrade in a similar manner to motor oil or transmission fluid.

As the fluid degrades, it looses its lubricity which can cause metal to metal wear. TerraClean Power Steering Kits help eliminate these issues.

TerraClean® Power Steering Cleaner cleans components in the power steering system, while the Power Steering Fluid helps restore the condition of the seals to help eliminate and prevent leaks. It also helps eliminate noise in the system and reduces potential wear of expensive components. Using a TerraClean® Power Steering Cleaning Kit is an effective method of flushing your customers’ power steering system and helping to maintain proper performance.

Also available with TerraClean Red Power Steering Fluid & Conditioner (Part Number 207240).

For Use with the TerraSteer Power Steering Service Machine

Download the TerraClean Functional Fluid Guide

Part Name: TerraSteer Power Steering Service Machine Part # 207100
Descriptions:
[

Features and Benefits

  • Quickly cleans and refills the power steering system in less than 10 minutes
  • Can perform service manually or automatically
  • Long wand allows for service on vehicles with remote reservoir
  • Completes service with no spills for a clean service
  • No shop air or power required – runs off of 12 volt DC

 

Why use the TerraSteer™ Power Steering Service Machine?

Heat in the power steering system can cause power steering fluid to oxidize and lose its lubricity. As well, contaminants in the power steering system can accumulate over time.  Seals can become dry which can lead to seeping. These issues can create noise or even cause damage to the components of the power steering system. Many power steering system manufacturers will void the warranty on racks if power steering cleaning service is not performed when rack is replaced.

Unit Technical Specifications

Shipping Height: 40” (101.6cm)
Power Cord: 10’ (3m) 14 gauge
Shipping Width: 23.5” (59.7cm)
Power Supply: 12 volt
Shipping Depth: 20” (50.8cm) DC Operation
New Fluid Capacity: 70 oz. (2L)

]

Descriptions:
[

Features and Benefits

  • Combines TerraClean Universal Synthetic Power Steering Fluid & Conditioner with TerraClean Power Steering Cleaner
  • Thoroughly cleans the power steering system
  • Contains a unique friction modifier to reduce power steering noise
  • Suitable for use for most vehicles including those requiring Pentosin CHF11S or CHF 202
  • Conditions seals to eliminate and help prevent leaks

 

Product Description

Over time power steering fluid can degrade in a similar manner to motor oil or transmission fluid. As the fluid degrades, it looses its lubricity which can cause metal to metal wear. Dirt present in the fluid can cause damage to expensive components. TerraClean Universal Synthetic Green Power Steering Kits help eliminate these issues.

During the power steering service, TerraClean® Power Steering Cleaner cleans components in the power steering system, removing contaminants that can damage expensive parts.

Then TerraClean Universal Power Steering Fluid and Conditioner – Green replaces the old fluid.  It is specifically designed to withstand extreme temperatures.  It contains a friction modifier to eliminate noise in the power steering system and a seal conditioner to help prevent and eliminate leaks.  TerraClean Universal Synthetic Power Steering Fluid & Conditioner – Green is suitable for use with most power steering systems, including European applications requiring Pentosin CHF 11s or CHF 202.

Using a TerraClean® Power Steering Cleaning Kit is an effective method of servicing your customer’s power steering system and helping to maintain proper performance.

For Use with the TerraSteer Power Steering Service Machine.

Download the TerraClean Functional Fluid Guide

  • Suspends and removes varnish, sludge and contaminants from the transmission, torque converter, pump and lines
  • Prevents torque converter shudder

Product Description

During an ATF Service, TerraClean Automatic Transmission Cleaner loosens and removes contaminants such as sludge and varnish from the entire transmission system.

After performing an ATF Cleaning, TerraClean Anti-Shutter Transmission Treatment is added to new ATF. This will help eliminate shudder that can be present in some automatic transmissions. As well, it will slow the oxidization of the new fluid and revitalize the seals to help prevent fluid leaks.

  • Improves shifting and helps extend transmission life

 

Product Description

As ATF deteriorates, sludge and varnish can build up leading to transmisson failure.  TerraClean Automatic Transmission Cleaner removes sludge, varnish and other contaminants from the transmission, torque converter, pump, ATF cooler and fluid lines.  Keeping the system clean extends the life of the transmission.  Used in conjunction with an Automatic Transmission Service Machine as part of a complete Automatic Transmission service

Features and Benefits

  • Suspends and removes varnish, sludge and contaminants from the transmission, torque converter, pump and lines
  • Improves shifting and extends transmission life

Product Description

TerraClean® Transmission Cleaning kits help you perform a complete transmission service. TerraClean Automatic Transmission Cleaner loosens and removes contaminants such as sludge and varnish from the entire transmission system.

After performing an ATF Cleaning, TerraClean® Automatic Transmission Treatment is added to new ATF to slow the oxidization of the fluid and keep seals pliable to prevent fluid leaks.

Features and Benefits

Includes part numbers 204210 and 204235

  • Cleans and suspends sludge, varnish and other contaminants from the entire transmission system
  • Improves shifting and helps extend transmission life
  • Enhances Dexron® or Mercon® ATF to perform like Mercon® V or a highly friction modified ATF such as Mopar® ATF +3 and +4
  • Prevents shudder in converter clutches and clutch packs
  • Helps to smooth shifting
  • Reduces operating temperature to prevent transmission wear
  • Conditions & restores seals and O-rings
  • Inhibits foaming

TransTech III 500-1100BT

The Transtech III’s advanced electronic interface allows complete, “one-touch control. It even has quick and easy “Drain Pan”” unction for spill-free transmission filter changes during ATF exchange. The TransTech III connects through transmission cooler lines and provides a clean, environmentally-friendly and systematic approach to servicing automatic transmissions.

 

Features and Benefits

Automatic Inline Exchange – Connect to transmission cooler line and press one button. Walk away until the service is complete

Drain Pan-Feature – Allows operator to drain transmission pan for a convenient and mess-free filter change.

Transmission Cooler Flush Feature – Allows operator to flush transmission cooler and cooler lines.
